entry.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
entry.content: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

entry.title: hhmm134/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
entry.content: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

entry.title: Saruro/Froovo: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.
entry.content: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.

entry.title: vicchimenti/funnelback-proxy-dev: This development environment supports a lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.
entry.content: This development environment supports a lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.

entry.title: livrasand/Zedmonkey: A open-source userscript manager engineered for developers who demand speed and efficiency. Lightweight by design, powerful by default — automate seamlessly, script relentlessly.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.content: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

entry.title: ultimatepexe/calculator: A responsive and lightweight calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features basic arithmetic operations and a clean modern interface using Font Awesome icons.
entry.content: A responsive and lightweight calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features basic arithmetic operations and a clean modern interface using Font Awesome icons.

entry.title: hasElvin/vanilla-todo: A lightweight To-Do app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It allows users to add, delete, and store their tasks in local storage of the browser. No frameworks, no build tools - just pure frontend. It is perfect for learning and demonstrating core JavaScript DOM manipulation, event handling, and browser storage features.
entry.content: A lightweight To-Do app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It allows users to add, delete, and store their tasks in local storage of the browser. No frameworks, no build tools - just pure frontend. It is perfect for learning and demonstrating core JavaScript DOM manipulation, event handling, and browser storage features.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
